name: saho_shop
description: Bootstrap Drupal theme built for Centarro Commerce Kickstart

scripts.css-compile: echo 'Compiling SCSS...' && sass --load-path=node_modules --load-path=scss --style expanded --source-map --no-error-css scss/:css/ && echo 'SCSS compiled successfully!'
scripts.sdc-compile: echo 'Compiling SDC components...' && sass --load-path=node_modules --load-path=scss --load-path=components --style expanded --source-map --no-error-css components/:components/ && echo 'SDC components compiled successfully!'
scripts.css-prefix: echo 'Running PostCSS...' && postcss -u postcss-inline-svg autoprefixer --map --no-map.inline -r 'css/**/*.css' && echo 'PostCSS processing completed!'
scripts.sdc-prefix: echo 'Running PostCSS on SDC components...' && postcss -u postcss-inline-svg autoprefixer --map --no-map.inline -r 'components/*/*.css' && echo 'SDC PostCSS processing completed!'
scripts.build:dev: echo 'Starting dev build...' && npm-run-all --silent css-compile sdc-compile css-prefix sdc-prefix && echo 'Dev build completed!'
scripts.build: echo 'Starting production build...' && npm-run-all --silent lint:scss lint:sdc css-compile sdc-compile css-prefix sdc-prefix && echo 'Production build completed successfully!'
scripts.icons-sprite: echo 'Generating SVG sprite...' && svg-sprite --svg-namespace-classnames false --symbol --symbol-dest . --symbol-sprite images/saho_shop-icons.svg icons/*.svg && echo 'SVG sprite generated!'
scripts.lint:scss: echo 'Linting SCSS...' && stylelint "scss/**/*.scss" --fix && echo 'SCSS lint completed!'
scripts.lint:sdc: echo 'Linting SDC SCSS...' && stylelint "components/**/*.scss" --fix && echo 'SDC SCSS lint completed!'

author: majmunbog <ivan@centarro.io>
